org.dotplot.fmatrix
Class FileInformation

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.fmatrix.FileInformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FileInformation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Class stores all processed information of the used source files (dotplot sourcefiles) for later retrieval.

See Also:
